snippet.title: Gladio Mori - Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Gladio Mori is a cutting-edge physics-based multiplayer fighting game where you use razor-sharp weapons to cut down your enemies or die trying. Fight against your friends in online or local split-screen multiplayer, supporting up to 4 players. Pick your blade, choose your armour and create a fighting style unique to you. Enter the arena to face your friends or hone your abilities against the AI. 

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2689120/Gladio_Mori/

#newgames #upcominggames #gameplay #gametrailers #hema #medieval #sword #armor #fun #unity3d #indiegames #realistic #physics #gladiomori
